docs.lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization will seek $25 million for a six-month programme to fight the Zika virus linked to birth defects, including studies on whether it is spread by sex or by blood transfusion, a senior WHO official told Reuters on Friday.

headline.main: WHO Seeks $25 Million for Six-Month Fight Against Zika
headline.print_headline: WHO Seeks $25 Million for Six-Month Fight Against Zika

docs.snippet: The World Health Organization will seek $25 million for a six-month programme to fight the Zika virus linked to birth defects, including studies on whether it is spread by sex or by blood transfusion, a senior WHO official told Reuters on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia's health minister said on Friday he believes there is a connection between the Zika virus, Guillain-Barre syndrome and the deaths of three Colombians, as the virus continues its rapid spread throughout the Americas.

headline.main: Colombian Minister Sees Link of Zika, Guillain-Barre, Three Deaths
headline.print_headline: Colombian Minister Sees Link of Zika, Guillain-Barre, Three Deaths

docs.snippet: Colombia's health minister said on Friday he believes there is a connection between the Zika virus, Guillain-Barre syndrome and the deaths of three Colombians, as the virus continues its rapid spread throughout the Americas.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Latest on efforts to battle the Zika virus (all times local):

headline.main: The Latest: Puerto Rico Declares Zika Emergency
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Puerto Rico Declares Zika Emergency

docs.snippet: The Latest on efforts to battle the Zika virus (all times local):

docs.lead_paragraph: In a sign of mounting global concern over the Zika virus, health officials on Friday warned pregnant women to think twice about the lips they kiss and called on men to use condoms with pregnant partners if they have visited countries where the virus is present.

headline.main: In Brazil, Pregnant Women Urged to Be Cautious With a Kiss
headline.print_headline: In Brazil, Pregnant Women Urged to Be Cautious With a Kiss

docs.snippet: In a sign of mounting global concern over the Zika virus, health officials on Friday warned pregnant women to think twice about the lips they kiss and called on men to use condoms with pregnant partners if they have visited countries where the virus...

docs.lead_paragraph: A researcher sits in a laboratory in Indonesia, his arms extended over clear plastic boxes buzzing with mosquitoes: over the next 20 minutes, tiny bumps develop on his skin as the insects bite dozens of times.

headline.main: In Indonesia, an Experiment With Bacteria to Tackle Zika
headline.print_headline: In Indonesia, an Experiment With Bacteria to Tackle Zika

docs.snippet: A researcher sits in a laboratory in Indonesia, his arms extended over clear plastic boxes buzzing with mosquitoes: over the next 20 minutes, tiny bumps develop on his skin as the insects bite dozens of times.

docs.lead_paragraph: The tiny South Pacific island nation of Tonga has declared an outbreak of the Zika virus after five cases of the mosquito-borne illness were confirmed and another 259 suspected, the country's chief medical officer said on Friday.

headline.main: Tropical Tonga Declares Zika Outbreak After Five Cases Confirmed
headline.print_headline: Tropical Tonga Declares Zika Outbreak After Five Cases Confirmed

docs.snippet: The tiny South Pacific island nation of Tonga has declared an outbreak of the Zika virus after five cases of the mosquito-borne illness were confirmed and another 259 suspected, the country's chief medical officer said on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Fear of the mosquito-borne Zika virus has Brazilians rushing to buy repellant, creating a shortage of some brands on pharmacy shelves and boosting sales for the industry - a trend some producers are preparing for elsewhere as the outbreak spreads.

headline.main: Mosquito Repellant Sales Boom in Brazil Amid Zika Scare
headline.print_headline: Mosquito Repellant Sales Boom in Brazil Amid Zika Scare

docs.snippet: Fear of the mosquito-borne Zika virus has Brazilians rushing to buy repellant, creating a shortage of some brands on pharmacy shelves and boosting sales for the industry - a trend some producers are preparing for elsewhere as the outbreak spreads.

docs.lead_paragraph: New Zealand's Olympic athletes and officials have been warned of the risk associated with the Zika virus on Friday, including the possibility that it could be sexually transmitted.

headline.main: New Zealand Athletes Given Warnings on Zika
headline.print_headline: New Zealand Athletes Given Warnings on Zika

docs.snippet: New Zealand's Olympic athletes and officials have been warned of the risk associated with the Zika virus on Friday, including the possibility that it could be sexually transmitted.

headline.main: Whooping Cough Booster Shot May Offer Only Short-Term Protection

docs.abstract: The rapidly fading effectiveness of the pertussis booster vaccine may help explain recent widespread outbreaks of whooping cough.
docs.snippet: The rapidly fading effectiveness of the pertussis booster vaccine may help explain recent widespread outbreaks of whooping cough.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention urged pregnant women whose male partners have spent time in a Zika-affected country to abstain from sex or use condoms during their pregnancy.

headline.main: C.D.C. Issues Zika Advisory for Pregnant Women and Sex Partners
headline.print_headline: Zika Transmission via Sex Prompts C.D.C. Advisory

docs.abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention advise pregnant women to use condoms or abstain from sex with male partners who have traveled through countries affected by Zika virus; warning comes after Dallas health officials confirm first American case of sexual transmission of Zika virus, which is potentially linked to birth defects.
docs.snippet: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention urged pregnant women whose male partners have spent time in a Zika-affected country to abstain from sex or use condoms during their pregnancy.
